species.name: charmeleon
descriptions: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
It is very hotheaded by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.

abilities.name: blaze
abilities.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
